query:
query ($var0:String!) {
		samlproviderdomain {
			created_at,
			domain,
			domain_ownership {
				_id,
				created_at,
				domain,
				id,
				may_cancel,
				secret,
				state,
				updated_at,
				verification_content,
				verification_method,
				verification_method_label,
				verified_at,
			},
			id,
			updated_at,
		}
	}
